Todo List

Member Preprocessor::applyGlobalThresholding ()
Avoid the assumption made about background's gray level. Sometimes a press clip background comes in dark gray levels and the ink in light ones. Some function should be developed to automatically make the right decision.

Member Text::addCharacter (const std::string &character, const unsigned int &position)
Design a better mechanism to throw an exception whenever the string passed contains more than one character. The solution is not simple, as any character with accent causes std::string::size() method to return 2 instead of 1.
